title: NeuroFlow Dashboard
description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard for neural network training metrics with real-time visualization and performance tracking. Features include live GPU monitoring, loss/accuracy charts, training logs, and model comparison tools.

prompt.text: Create a modern analytics dashboard for monitoring neural network training. Include real-time charts for loss/accuracy, GPU utilization, and training logs. Use dark theme with neon accents. Framework: Angular with Chart.js.

title: CryptoVault Landing
description: Modern cryptocurrency wallet landing page with animated hero section, feature showcase, and trust badges. Includes smooth scroll animations, 3D coin graphics, and responsive design.

prompt.text: Design a sleek landing page for a cryptocurrency wallet app. Include animated hero with 3D coin graphics, security features section, and testimonials. Use gradient backgrounds with purple/blue theme.

title: DevPortfolio Pro
description: Clean and minimal developer portfolio with project showcase, skills section, and contact form. Features smooth page transitions and dark mode support.

prompt.text: Build a minimal developer portfolio website. Include project cards with hover effects, skills grid, about section, and contact form. Use monochrome color scheme with accent color.

title: TaskMaster Admin
description: Comprehensive admin panel for task management with kanban boards, team collaboration, and analytics. Features drag-and-drop functionality and real-time updates.

prompt.text: Create an admin panel for task management. Include kanban board, task lists, team member cards, and analytics dashboard. Use sidebar navigation and clean UI design.

title: EcoShop Store
description: Modern e-commerce storefront for sustainable products. Features product grid, filtering, shopping cart, and checkout flow with beautiful product imagery.

prompt.text: Build an e-commerce website for eco-friendly products. Include product grid with filters, shopping cart, product details page, and checkout. Use green color palette and nature-inspired design.

title: AI SaaS Landing
description: High-converting landing page for AI-powered SaaS product. Features animated sections, pricing tiers, feature comparison, and CTA buttons throughout.

prompt.text: Create a landing page for an AI SaaS product. Include hero with animated background, features section with icons, pricing table, testimonials, and FAQ. Use purple/blue gradient theme.

title: BlogFlow CMS
description: Content management system for bloggers with rich text editor, media library, and SEO tools. Clean and distraction-free writing experience.

prompt.text: Build a blogging CMS with rich text editor, post management, categories, tags, and media library. Include clean writing interface and preview mode. Use minimal design with focus on content.

title: DataViz Dashboard
description: Interactive data visualization dashboard with multiple chart types, real-time updates, and export functionality. Perfect for business intelligence.

prompt.text: Create a data visualization dashboard with various chart types (line, bar, pie, scatter). Include date range selector, data filters, and export to PDF/CSV. Use professional dark theme.

title: FitTrack Mobile UI
description: Fitness tracking application UI with workout plans, progress charts, and social features. Optimized for mobile-first experience.

prompt.text: Design a mobile-first fitness tracking app. Include workout calendar, progress charts, exercise library, and social feed. Use energetic color palette with orange/red accents.

title: SpaceX Dashboard Clone
description: SpaceX-inspired dashboard with mission tracking, rocket launches, and telemetry data. Features futuristic design with animations.

prompt.text: Create a SpaceX-inspired dashboard showing rocket launches, mission data, and telemetry. Include countdown timers, 3D rocket model, and live data feeds. Use black/white theme with blue accents.

title: Recipe Finder App
description: Recipe discovery application with ingredient-based search, cooking instructions, and meal planning. Beautiful food photography showcase.

prompt.text: Build a recipe app with search by ingredients, recipe cards with photos, cooking instructions, and shopping list. Use warm color palette and appetizing food imagery.

title: RealEstate Platform
description: Modern real estate listing platform with property search, map view, and virtual tours. Features advanced filtering and saved searches.

prompt.text: Create a real estate platform with property listings, map integration, advanced filters (price, bedrooms, location), and virtual tour viewer. Use clean professional design.
